entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
